title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series, the current behavior is that it does not provide a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the expected behavior is that it should pop up a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Perform the action that is expected to result in no data for a series.
